name: Data analyst
description:
Company profile

We are the American company "Sensin", in October 2020 we reached the investment round and attracted financing. Our brand operates in the American FMCG market in the field of health care, personal hygiene. Now we are at the stage of actively building a strong team of professionals.

Job Summary

  • Visualization in Power BI;

  • Online store analysis: calculating customer return by weekly cohorts (Google Sheets);

  • Calculation of unit economy indicators for each weekly cohort;

  • Conduct promotional analysis to evaluate ROI, lift and business impact, helping inform/adapt future plans

  • Determination of return on investment in advertising (ROI);

  • Selection of the most effective cities and sources of promotion in the ROI metric.

  • Determination of the LTV calculation model;

  • Estimation of costs and revenues;

  • LTV calculation;

  • Building reports in PBI with LTV display;

  • Construction of cohort analysis, market analysis, competitors, trends;

  • Ability to work with a large amount of data;

  • Segmentation of online store users;

  • Analysis of the results of the AB test (online store);

  • Leading of continuous development of the analytics practice in scope, including service portfolio evolution and aligned to global frameworks;

  • Manage demand for insights and analytics. Oversee the collection, tracking, mining and analysis of data and the generation of fact-based insights using multiple data sources;

  • Provide analytics services to stakeholders;

  • Ensure analytics results drive consumer experience and business impact and help achieve market sales plans;

  • Lead or support assigned projects in areas such as analytics implementation, database integration, tag management, qualitative data, etc.

Requirements

5 years of experience in relevant position

Proficiency in spoken and written English and Russian languages

What we offer:

  • Participation in a unique project in the American market
  • Competitive salary (discussed at an interview)
  • Remote format of work in an international company
  • A professional team with talented specialists to achieve your ambitious goals
  • The opportunity to share and exchange experiences with colleagues from different countries
